parameters.name: Authorization
Accept
parameters.description:
Specifies your preference for the response format.

Supported formats: 
- text/event-stream
- application/json or text/json
- text/plain

parameters.name: X-Cache-Tolerance
parameters.description: Sets internal cache tolerance in seconds if this header is specified with a integer.

parameters.name: X-No-Cache
parameters.description:
Ignores internal cache if this header is specified with a value.

Equivalent to X-Cache-Tolerance: 0

parameters.name: X-Respond-With
parameters.description:
Specifies the (non-default) form factor of the crawled data you prefer.

Supported formats: 
- markdown
- html
- text
- pageshot
- screenshot
- content
- any combination of the above

Default: content

parameters.name: X-Wait-For-Selector
parameters.description:
Specifies a CSS selector to wait for the appearance of such an element before returning.

Example: `X-Wait-For-Selector: .content-block`

parameters.name: X-Target-Selector
parameters.description:
Specifies a CSS selector for return target instead of the full html.

Implies `X-Wait-For-Selector: (same selector)`

parameters.name: X-Remove-Selector
parameters.description:
Specifies a CSS selector to remove elements from the full html.

Example `X-Remove-Selector: nav`

parameters.name: X-Keep-Img-Data-Url
parameters.description:
Keep data-url as it instead of transforming them to object-url. (Only applicable when targeting markdown format)

Example `X-Keep-Img-Data-Url: true`

parameters.name: X-Proxy-Url
parameters.description:
Specifies your custom proxy if you prefer to use one.

Supported protocols: 
- http
- https
- socks4
- socks5

For authentication, https://user:pass@host:port

parameters.name: X-Set-Cookie
parameters.description:
Sets cookie(s) to the headless browser for your request. 

Syntax is the same with standard Set-Cookie

parameters.name: X-With-Generated-Alt
parameters.description:
Enable automatic alt-text generating for images without an meaningful alt-text.

Note: Does not work when `X-Respond-With` is specified

parameters.name: X-With-Images-Summary
parameters.description: Enable dedicated summary section for images on the page.

parameters.name: X-With-links-Summary
parameters.description: Enable dedicated summary section for hyper links on the page.

parameters.name: X-Retain-Images
parameters.description:
Image retention modes.

Supported modes: 
- all: all images
- none: no images
- alt: only alt text
- all_p: all images and with generated alt text
- alt_p: only alt text and with generated alt

parameters.name: X-With-Iframe
parameters.description: Enable filling iframe contents into main. (violates standards)

parameters.name: X-With-Shadow-Dom
parameters.description: Enable filling shadow dom contents into main. (violates standards)

parameters.name: X-User-Agent
parameters.description: Override User-Agent.

parameters.name: X-Timeout
parameters.description: Specify timeout in seconds. Max 180.

parameters.name: X-Locale
parameters.description: Specify browser locale for the page.

parameters.name: X-Referer
parameters.description: Specify referer for the page.

parameters.name: X-Token-Budget
parameters.description:
Specify a budget in tokens.

If the resulting token cost exceeds the budget, the request is rejected.

parameters.name: X-Engine
parameters.description:
Specify the engine to use for crawling.

Supported: browser, direct, vlm, readerlm-v2

parameters.name: X-Base
parameters.description:
Select base modes of relative URLs.

Supported: initial, final
